name: Sticky Cube - Cube jump
description:
Welcome to a space adventure during which you will visit mysterious and geometry places seen so far only in cube world. This game will engross you for long hours. It may seem difficult at the beginning, but after a few attempts and jumps you will begin to gain new skills worthy of a champion.

Controls are simple and similar to Angry Birds. Hold your finger on the cube, pull and aim at the nearest post. Make sure that the cube attaches to its surface after release. Aim with caution because every point is extremely important.
If you finish aiming within the time indicated by the bar above you will get an additional bonus and your information during aiming will not be shortened.

Collect crystals and win new cubes.

Try also additional game modes:
- Travel in time – try to finish in time while travelling through successive posts
- Travel through mist – here, instead of travelling upwards, your objective will be throw the cube towards the left side.

Collect crystals and discover new worlds.
